title: This Could Be a Real Adventure
description: Kids from an ordinary planet discover a surprising secret.
crawl: Since the fall of the EMPIRE, the NEW REPUBLIC has maintained order. And yet, remote hyperspace routes are increasingly plagued by piracy. These PIRATES boldly brand their armored hulls as a sign to all ships. Surrender or dieâ€¦

title: Way, Way Out Past the Barrier
description: A surprising first stop marks the beginning of an unexpected journey.

title: Very Interesting, As an Astrogation Problem
description: A mysterious stranger offers to help our heroes.

title: Can't Say I Remember No At Attin
description: Our heroes face a surprise in a familiar setting.

title: You Have a Lot to Learn About Pirates
description: A seemingly pleasant world will test our heroes like no other.

title: Zero Friends Again
description: Relationships fray under the pressures of a difficult journey.

title: We're Gonna Be In So Much Trouble
description: Our heroes have never felt further from home.

title: The Real Good Guys
description: A journey filled with adventure comes to a surprising end.
